# crecimiento logistico

#ecuacion diferencial: N'=rN(1-N/k).

#solucion analitica: N =(k*No*exp(rt)/(k + No*(exp(rt) - 1))



```{r, echo=FALSE}
rm(list=ls())
logistic <- function(t, r, K, N0) {
   K * N0 * exp(r * t) / (K + N0 * (exp(r * t) - 1))
   }
plot(0:100, logistic(t = 0:100, r = 0.1, K = 10, N0 = 0.1))
```
